user_prompt: A box has 7 red balls and 5 blue balls. How many balls are there in total? Answer with just the number.
There are 18 cookies. If 4 are eaten, how many remain? Answer with just the number.
I have 12 pencils and buy 9 more. How many pencils do I have now? Answer with just the number.
You pick 20 apples and give away 6. How many apples are left? Answer with just the number.
There are 15 stickers shared equally among 3 friends. How many stickers does each friend get? Answer with just the number.
A shelf has 9 books. You add 7 more. How many books are there now? Answer with just the number.
You read 25 pages and then 10 more. How many pages did you read? Answer with just the number.
A bunch of 14 balloons loses 4. How many balloons remain? Answer with just the number.
A bus has 30 seats. 18 are taken. How many seats are free? Answer with just the number.
There are 5 bags with 3 oranges each. How many oranges total? Answer with just the number.
A pile of 40 candies is shared equally among 8 kids. How many candies per kid? Answer with just the number.
A bakery has 16 cupcakes and bakes 9 more. How many cupcakes now? Answer with just the number.
A concert sold 50 tickets. 20 were refunded. How many tickets remain sold? Answer with just the number.
You have 100 coins and spend 35. How many coins remain? Answer with just the number.
There are 8 crates with 6 apples each. How many apples total? Answer with just the number.
A meeting lasts 60 minutes and is extended by 25 minutes. How many minutes total? Answer with just the number.
There are 90 students split equally into 3 classes. How many students per class? Answer with just the number.
A track is 45 meters. You run 4 laps. How many meters total? Answer with just the number.
There are 70 water bottles packed 10 per box. How many boxes are needed? Answer with just the number.
You have 27 marbles and get 15 more. How many marbles in total? Answer with just the number.
A room has 14 chairs and 9 stools. How many seats in total? Answer with just the number.
A pen box holds 18 pens. If 7 are removed, how many remain? Answer with just the number.
There are 6 packs with 12 sodas each. How many sodas total? Answer with just the number.
24 cupcakes are shared equally among 6 friends. How many cupcakes each? Answer with just the number.
You walked 33 km and then 12 km more. How many km total? Answer with just the number.
You have 12 eggs and buy 18 more. How many eggs now? Answer with just the number.
You have 22 dollars and spend 9. How many dollars remain? Answer with just the number.
A park has 48 trees. Plant 12 more. How many trees then? Answer with just the number.
A reader finished 90 pages and reads 45 more. How many pages total? Answer with just the number.
There are 9 cars, each with 4 wheels. How many wheels total? Answer with just the number.
